name: Twilight Gal
description:
Twilight Gal is a Puzzle-Platformer created for the Global Game Jam 2022 with the theme; Duality.

Collect the coins scattered in the miniature levels by going back and forward between the real and shadow realms. Move objects around to increase the shadow size so you can access higher places when in the shadow realm, or move them to unblock areas that were not currently accessible.

Controls

W A S D - Move
R - Reset Character and Crates
K - Enter/Exit the shadow plane
